page.title: 15A Scunthorpe Church Club
page.content: Every Wednesday evening from 6.15 pm until 7.45 pm Bonnie and Jane go to the{Girls' Friendly Society}at{St. {Lawrence's Church}in Scunthorpe. The leaders' names are Jane, Hazel and Heather. Every month there is a{Church Parade at St. Lawrence's Church and we are all expected to go. The uniform consists of a navy skirt, white knee length socks, white blouse and a navy sweatshirt. We do a lot of{singing}in festivals and concerts and make friends with a lot of people; in fact we even go camping with them. We have{jumble {sales}and we make a lot of toys for children who have lost their mums and dads.
